title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't have the expected behavior.
OB: When the display property of the label item is set to 'none' and the PDF is previewed.
EB: The label should disappear when the PDF is previewed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Set the display property of the label item to 'none'. 
2. Preview the PDF. 
   3. Observe that the label is still visible in the PDF.
